headline: Ameren (NYSE:AEE) Declares US$0.71 Per Share Quarterly Dividend
summary: Ameren (NYSE:AEE) recently declared a quarterly cash dividend of 71 cents per share, a decision that aligns with the company's steady performance. Over the last month, Ameren's share price saw a modest increase of 1.09%. This price change occurred alongside earnings announcements, showcasing a revenue rise to $2,097 million and higher net income. Furthermore, the reaffirmation of Ameren's earnings guidance for 2025 likely bolstered investor confidence. While the broader market has been flat...
